channel.title: [MINOR] Wall in ST gives you electrical shocks
channel.description:
In the last map of urface Tension (the artillery map), there is a wall, that electricutes you. When you enter the area and go to the left, right away you'll reach a fence (that does nothing when touched), but to concrete wall to the right of it eletrecutes you. I'll add images and the setpos:
Entering the area, go to the left [spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/ykK6gj6.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
into the little space [spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/TlEEnvD.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
find this wall [spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/myFn8TM.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
which will eletrecute you [spoiler][img]https://i.imgur.com/q6ksR36.jpg[/img][/spoiler]
setpos -1435.470459 5018.078125 -27.830338; setang 1.640419 -168.302643 0.000000
